entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 9:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: E 64 km/h gust 82 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
